name: 2-Be-Best Upgraded Projector Mount,14-24in / 37-62cm Projector Ceiling Mount Extendable Ceiling Projectors Mounts Adjustable Angle 360° Rotation Drop Ceiling Projectors Mounts Silver
short_description: UNIVERSAL MOUNTING: Projector ceiling mount comes with 2 extra thread adapters to get 3 sizes screw threads, 0.153/0.232/0.25in (3.9/5.9/6.35mm). Projector mount for ceiling is compatible with HAPPRUN, CiBest, Aurzen, PANSEBA, NISOO, AuKing, HOMPOW, ELEPHAS, ClokoWe, Vankyo, Puxinat, DBPOWER, NEBULA, PVO,Samsung, TMY projector and most other mini projectors with 1 mounting screw.
EXTENDABLE LENGTH: Ceiling projector mount has an extending length from 14-24in / 37-62cm. Just adjust and fix a nice height of the drop ceiling projecto rmount for better projection.

FLEXIBLE ANGLE: Adjustable projector mount with 360° horizontal rotation and 90° vertical rotation ball head. Upgraded Easy-fixed Handle fastens the angle firmly. Just swivel your projectors and fix the angle to make clear projection image.

NICE DESIGNS: Projector mount is made of Premium Thickened Aluminium Alloy designed with Larger Base, Diamond Stainless Sliver Coating, Wire Hole, and Fixed Wrench. Projector holder for ceiling with a big loading capacity about 11 lbs / 5 kg.

WIDE USAGE: 2 in 1 projector ceiling mount and projector wall mount not only for projectors but also for Camera DSLR DV and other device mounted on ceiling or wall. Eligible for almost all projectors with 1 single mounting hole.

Ceiling mount for projector with many useful accessories like, cable zip ties, thread adapters, mounting screws and plastic anchors. Tip: Extra cable zip ties we offer to help projector cable management.
2-Be-Best Projector Ceiling Mount with 24hrs customer service. You can rest assured to have 2-Be-Best Projector Mount with lifetime satisfaction service for this 2 Be Best choice mount for projector

name: Aurzen Projector Ceiling Mount with New Gimbal, 15.75" - 23.62" Adjustable Length, ¼-Inch Screw, Compatible with TMY, HAPPRUN, Yaber, Epson & Most Projectors, Ceiling/Wall Use with Adjustable Angle
short_description: Universal Ceiling Mount: Compatible with projectors from Aurzen, TMY, HAPPRUN, Yaber, Aurzen, Epson, and other brands with a 1/4-inch screw hole. Aurzen projector ceiling mount supports both ceiling and wall installations, making it a versatile choice for various projector mount setups

Supports Up to 5KG (11 lbs): Crafted from durable aluminum alloy, our projector mount provides secure support for projectors weighing up to 5KG, ensuring stability and safe installation on your ceiling or wall

Adjustable Length 15.75" - 23.62": This projector ceiling mount features an extendable design, allowing you to easily adjust the length between 15.75 and 23.62 inches. Simply loosen and tighten the screw to achieve the ideal position for your ceiling projector mount

New-Design Adjustable Angle: Featuring a newly designed universal joint, our mount is more durable than traditional options and resists damage. It allows precise angle adjustments of up to 15° in each direction (left and right), providing a total adjustment range of 30° to ensure the perfect projection setup. For detailed instructions, please refer to the user manual.
Important Compatibility Information: Ensure your projector has a 1/4-inch tripod screw hole and weighs no more than 5KG (11 lbs) for safe use

Installation and Support: Mount only on sturdy walls like concrete, brick, or wooden walls. Avoid drywall, plywood, or cement board. For any issues, contact our 7*24 support team for a response within 12 hours

name: WALI Projector Ceiling Mount Tray，Projector Wall Mount Holds up to 22lbs, Height Adjustable Universal Projectors Mount, No Hole Installation, Hidden Cable Routing, Black(PM-005-B)
short_description: Application: WALI Durable steel ceiling/wall mount fits most projectors, laptops, or cameras. Tray holds up to 22 lbs. Size: 13.7" x 8.6" x 1.9". Great for screens and electronic devices

Height Adjustment: Its height adjustability allows you to change rooms, projectors, and screen configurations without buying a new mount. When ceiling mount it can extend 14.1"-21.6", when wall mount it can extend 22.8"-30.2"(including universal tray)

Easy Installation: Step-by-step instructions and hardware are provided for smooth assembly and installation. After assembling the mount, simply screw the mount to the ceiling and place the projector or camera on the tray
Hidden Cable Management: With a cord hider, It can easily organize cables to make your space cleaner

Package Includes: WALI Projector Ceiling and Wall Brackets x 1, trayx 1,Mounting Hardware Kit x 1, User Manual x 1, experienced and friendly US based customer support available to assist 7 days a week

name: VIVO Universal Ceiling Extending Projector Tray Mount, Height Adjustable Projection, No Hole Installation, Hidden Cable Routing, Black, MOUNT-VP08B
short_description: Universal Ceiling Projector Tray Mount - This ceiling-mounted platform is designed for projectors that don't have mounting holes and fits the majority of projectors on the market. Also can be used to hold a video camera, laptop, or other electronic device. The metal 13.8” x 8.7” tray holds up to 11 lbs of weight.
Height Adjustment - The arm extends 12.3” to 20.4” from the ceiling to allow ideal placement for customized viewing. Please Note: Not intended for sloped or pitched ceilings.
Hidden Cable Management - Enjoy a clean display with cords neatly routed through the pole and hidden from sight.
Easy Installation - Step-by-step instructions and hardware are provided for smooth assembly and installation.
We've Got You Covered - Sturdy steel design is backed with a 3 Year Manufacturer Warranty and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.

name: Full Motion Universal Ceiling Projector Mount Bracket with Adjustable Height and Extendable Arms Rotating Swivel Mount for Home and Office Projector (Black)
short_description: Universally Compatible: This projector ceiling mount supports most projector brands with distance between the mounting holes on back 12.1 inches or less. This mount can be used on flat ceiling.
High Grade Material: Crafted from premium quality and heavy duty steel to provide a reliable projector mount with maximum strength and support. Max Load: 30 lbs (13.6kg).

Full Motion Adjustable Mount: Our projector ceiling mount can tilt 25 degrees up and down, swivels 90 degree from left to right and 360 degrees rotation, hitting all possible viewing angles. The mount provides a 43.6-inch extension and collapses to 23-inch from the ceiling using the extendable arm and 8.9-inch without the arm.

Easy to Install: Pre-assembled, this projection mount can be set up in a few steps with quick release hooks that attach and detach by tightening and loosening mounting bolts. Warm Tip: To prevent the mount from shaking,please tighten the screws marked in the picture above.

Package includes: A pre-assembled projector ceiling mount and all necessary hardware and instructions booklet. Compatible with BenQ, Epson, Acer, Optoma, Sony, Video, Dell and other popular brands. If our product is not suitable for your projector, or if you have any questions about the product and package, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: VIVO Universal Adjustable Ceiling Projector Mount for Regular and Mini Projectors with Extending Arms, White, MOUNT-VP01W
short_description: Universal Projector Mount - Fits most projectors on the market, including mini projectors (Please Note: Extension arms need to be removed for mini projectors and the mounting screw for mini projectors is Not Included). The distance between mounting holes on the back of the projector must be 5.25" to 12.5” with arms and 1.5" x 1.5" without arms. Not compatible with the following projector models: Epson LS1100, 3010, 3200, 3700, 3800, 8350, 8500UB, 4010, Mitsubishi XL25U, or LG HU915QE.
Strong 30 Lbs Support - Made entirely of high-grade steel, this mount holds projectors weighing up to 30 lbs, keeping your expensive equipment safe and secure.
Fully Adjustable - Features +15° to -15° tilt, +15° to -15° swivel, and 360° rotation. Hits all the right viewing angles so you and your guests can watch in comfort.
Low Profile - This mounting system holds your projector just 6” from the ceiling surface. The white powder-coated finish blends well with the majority of home and office environments.
Easy Installation - Quick release hooks attach and detach by tightening and loosening the mounting bolts. All hardware and instructions are provided for assembly.
product_description: MOUNT-VP01W is a brand new, heavy duty, all steel, universal ceiling projector mount. Ideal for any home or office, this high grade steel mount is weight tested at 30lbs and designed with adjustable arms to fit most projector brands with mounting ranges from 2â€ to 12.5â€. MOUNT-VP01W sits 6â€ from flat ceilings making it low profile. Features include 15 degree tilt, 15 degree swivel, and 360 degree rotation to maximize projection angles. Simple tightening of joints makes this as fluid or stationary as desired. This is a quick assembly and comes with common mounting hardware. The projector mount comes in a white finish.

name: WALI Projector Mount Ceiling/Wall - Universal 3-in-1 Bracket with Extension Pole, Height Adjustable Holder for LCD/DLP Projectors, Supports up to 44lbs, White (PM-003-W)

name: PropVue Universal Projector Mount - Adjustable Ceiling or Wall Mount for Office & Home Mini Projectors - Full Motion, Easy Installation, 360° Swivel, Extendable Length 13.8" to 21"
short_description: FULL MOTION UNIVERSAL PROJECTOR MOUNT: Designed to fit regular and mini projectors with mounting hole distances from 5.2" to 14". Perfect for home entertainment, classroom setups, or conference rooms. Compatible with a wide range of projector models.

ADJUSTABLE CEILING or WALL MOUNT: Featuring a telescoping extendable arm, the adjustable projector mount allows height from 13.8" to 21", making it suitable for any setup, providing flexibility and stability for your projection needs.

DURABLE & RELIABLE CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from premium, heavy-duty materials, supporting up to 16.4 lbs (7 kg), best for secure mounting and reliable installation. Ideal as a ceiling projector mount, projector wall mount, or projector holder.

ENHANCED VIEWING FLEXIBILITY: Whether you need a rotating projector mount or a full motion adjustable mount, this design ensures optimal viewing angles. Achieve perfect projection with 360° swivel head, rotation and maximum tilt range up to 180°.
QUICKEST & EASIEST INSTALLATION: The quick-release system of ceiling mount projector makes setup fast and stress-free. While the included drilling template and hardware make it easy to install.
